annonstext:
To further consolidate and strengthen our GE Renewable Energy Wind turbine service and maintenance teams in Sweden we are looking for qualified and committed Field Technicians. The wind farm is located in Ragunda municipality, which is located about one hour east of Östersund.

Essential Responsibilities :

Ability to work independently on the implementation of fault analyses and repair of wind turbine generator systems, including clarification of any

client queries. 

Planned and preventive maintenance of wind turbine

generator systems. 

Documenting of call-out responses, fault finding and repair work in service reports, logbooks and checklists. 

Coordination of external and internal service providers and contractors on site. 

Contact person for client technical queries, such as retrofits and repairs.  

Qualifications/Requirements :

Professional training in electrical engineering sector (electrician, power electronics system, mechatronic engineer). 

Familiar with MS.Office operating system. 

Familiar with PLCs. 

High degree of quality awareness; excellent fault finding and diagnostic skills combined with the ability to detect and remedy faults, defects, problems. 

Able to work at heights and high level of physical fitness. 

Structured worker with technical analytical abilities. 

Fluency in English language, Swedish a plus. 

Prepared to travel.

Willing to work sometimes also at the weekends. 

Class B driving license (license for

driving trucks up to 3,5 t with trailer). 

EU Work Permit. 

Desired Characteristics :

Electrical/mechanical service or maintenance experience will be of additional advantage.

 

Additional Information

Relocation Assistance Provided: FIRSTNAME
